S

SAMPLING_INTERVAL_US - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
Period of sampling f (ms).
ScanSearchZone() - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
In this method, the robot scans the search zone from left to right OR right to left.
SENSOR_TO_CENTER_DIST - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
Distance from end of US sensor to center of robot
Sensors - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
This class is responsible for running the 3 colour sensors and the ultrasonic sensor in threads and storing the data returned by each sensor.
Sensors() - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Sensors
 
SERVER_IP - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
The IP address of the server that transmits data to the robot.
setDeltaAngle(double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Reading
the angle from the initial orientation of the robot is set to deltaAngle
setDistances(int) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Reading
the distance returned from the US sensor for a specific angle from the initial orientation of the robot is set to distance
setTheta(double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
Overwrites theta.
setTimeout(long) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Display
Sets the timeout in ms.
setX(double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
Overwrites x.
setXyt(double, double, double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
Overrides the values of x, y and theta.
setY(double) - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
Overwrites y.
showText(String...) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Display
Shows the text on the LCD, line by line.
sleepFor(long) - Static method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Main
Sleeps for the specified duration.
stopMotors() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicLocalizer
Stops both the left wheel motor and the right wheel motor
StrandedVehicle - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
This class is responsible for detecting the vertical pin of the stranded vehicle and eventually lifting the stranded vehicle
StrandedVehicle() - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.StrandedVehicle
 
sweep() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicLocalizer
Method to perform a 360 degrees sweep and record each distance readings in a Reading.java object.
szg - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
The green search zone.
szr - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
The red search zone.
